: : Hollywood/Sting/Savage/KroniK : :

Hollywood, Sting, Savage, Wrath, and=
 Crush all follow loyally, ready to cast genocide on the Predacons.  Hollyw=
ood sends out a special message to everybody, the meaning directed at the P=
redacons.

Hollywood: Predacons, listen up brothers........WHATCHA GONNA DO=
, WHEN THE nWo RUNS WILD ON YOU!???????????/

Hollywood draws his "Hulkabla=
ster" gattling gun, and fires madly as he flies closer to the Maximal base.=
  Sting, Savage, and KroniK also make it to the Maximal base, and transform=
 to robot mode, getting ready to assume battle positions.

Sting:  This is =
the New...World...Order!  nWo, I'm going to get inside, and mount a strateg=
ic offensive grasp on the Predacons!  Arrow, can you come with me inside th=
e Maximal base??

---------------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------------
The preceding announcement has been paid for =
by the 
New World Order
